April 20, 2002 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-first-section
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Soloist Prize: Gareth Hann, cornet—Treherbert and District Prizes - 1st £125, 2nd £75, 3rd £60.
Aug. 12, 2015, 9:48 p.m. June 30, 2020, 8:54 p.m.
1 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard Variations on a Ninth
2 Ammanford Silver Band Colin Hogg Triumphant Rhapsody
3 Abergavenny Borough Band Tudor Williams Trittico [Curnow]
4 Tylorstown Band Leigh Phillips Purcell Variations [Downie]
5 Rogerstone Band Ceri Thomas The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
6 Ynyshir Band Alan Gibbs Spectrum [Vinter]
